name: Firefox Search Progress Icon as Tab-Throbber
description:
For Firefox 3.6+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

A Loading Progress Tab-Throbber for Firefox.

Tested on Firefox 3.6+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

To customize or fix Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds, you can also have a look at my other styles: user 61655
additional_info:
Updated 12-13-2011
Now compatible with latest Nightly 11.0a1 and later.

Updated 12-20-2010
Added code to make it work with Firefox 3.x and Firefox 4 beta 7 and later.

discussions.name: Guys who want to use this with Loading Progress line on Tab bar for Firefox 4 betas read this!
Acts as different throbber style on versions with throbber (FF4+ I think)
